metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46873 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: WireGuard, such as WireGuard 0.5.3 on Windows, does not fully account for the possibility that an adversary might be able to set a victim's system time to a future value, e.g., because unauthenticated NTP is used. This can lead to an outcome in which one static private key becomes permanently useless.

notes.Note: evancaville> as of 2023-11-22, doesn't appear to be an upstream fix available for this issue.

criterions.comment: wireguard: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
